name: Pairmoji
description:
No matter what you call it (Concentration, Pairs, Match, Pelmanism or even Pexeso), this fun new take on the classic "pair matching" card game will have you and the whole family hooked.

• A huge selection of emoji to match.
• Single player turn-based or against the clock - try to beat the best on the Game Center leaderboards.
• Local multiplayer with up to 4 people.
• Pick from a range of different grid sizes.
• Great emoji SFX.
• Designed for iPhone X.
• Simple, pay up-front gameplay. No ads, in-app purchases or hidden costs.

If you like Pairmoji, please take a few seconds to leave us a nice review. It really helps!

A big shout out to the awesome Twemoji project. The Twemoji artwork in this app is licensed under CC-BY.
